inputs.name: deviceOption
inputs.label: Choose single/multiple device
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose to deploy to single or multiple(by tags) devices

inputs.name: iothubcs
inputs.label: IoT Hub connection string
inputs.visibleRule: deviceOption == Single Device || deviceOption == Multiple Devices
inputs.helpMarkDown: Input the IoT Hub connection string (In the form HostName=xx;SharedAccessKeyName=xx;SharedAccessKey=xx)

inputs.name: deviceId
inputs.label: IoT Hub device ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Input the IoT Hub device ID

inputs.name: connectedServiceNameARM
inputs.label: Azure subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select an Azure resource manager subscription for the deployment

inputs.name: targetcondition
inputs.label: IoT Hub device Target Condition
inputs.helpMarkDown: Input the target condition of devices you would like to deploy. Example: tags.building=9 and tags.environment='test'

inputs.name: dockerRegistryEndpoint
inputs.label: Docker Registry Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a Docker registry connection. Required for commands that need to authenticate with a registry.

inputs.name: moduleJsons
inputs.label: Module.json File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the modules you would like to build

inputs.name: qualifyImageName
inputs.label: Qualify Image Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Qualify the image name with the Docker registry connection's hostname if not otherwise specified.

inputs.name: includeSourceTags
inputs.label: Include Source Tags
inputs.helpMarkDown: Include Git tags when building or pushing the Docker image.

inputs.name: includeLatestTag
inputs.label: Include Latest Tag
inputs.helpMarkDown: Include the 'latest' tag when building or pushing the Docker image.

inputs.name: additionalImageTags
inputs.label: Additional Image Tags
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional tags for the Docker image being built or pushed.

inputs.name: dockerHostEndpoint
inputs.label: Docker Host Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a Docker host connection. Defaults to the agent's host.
